value.name: Wow! House: The Samuel Smith House In Southbury
value.description: Features: This well-maintained Federal home was built in c..1780 and custom-built for a South Britain merchant named Samuel Smith. The door plaque located by the front door indicates its History can be found in the State of Connecticut Historic Resources and Certified by the Commission.

value.name: Frank Samuel Smith
value.description: He was born on Saturday, December 18, 1937, in Catawba County, to the late Leonard Oscar and Cleo Bowman Smith Bowman. Mr. Smith was self-employed in the real estate profession for many years. Those left to cherish Frank’s memory include his wife of 49 years,

value.name: SAMUEL SMITH
value.description: Samuel ‘Sam’ Joseph Smith, 74, of Meshoppen, passed away at his home, surrounded by his family, on Wednesday evening, May 12, 2021.
